**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 205 2.0 **Usage** held in 2 hands **Bulk** 1 --- Made of pure gold with platinum strings, the _phistophilus fiddle_ shouldn't be able to play a note—but play it does, so beautifully that it can move almost any audience. The fiddle was stolen from the [contract devil](/Monsters.aspx?ID=112) who created it, and the cunning fiend still wants to reclaim the instrument. Fiendish misfortunes often befall its owners, allowing it to switch hands. The fiddle is a handheld [virtuoso instrument](/Equipment.aspx?ID=37). --- **Minor Gifts**: [little helper](/Relics.aspx?ID=33), [muse](/Relics.aspx?ID=87) ([Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12))
**Major Gifts**: [charming](/Relics.aspx?ID=88), [fiendish bargain](/Relics.aspx?ID=34)
**Grand Gift**: [artistic perfection](/Relics.aspx?ID=90) (Performance)
name: Phistophilus Fiddle
